examples: He officially announced his intention to resign at today's press conference.
Anunció oficialmente su intención de dimitir en la rueda de prensa de hoy.
They haven't formally announced their engagement yet.
Todavía no han anunciado formalmente su compromiso.
A ring at the doorbell announced Jack's arrival.
Un timbre anunció la llegada de Jack.
We are pleased to announce that all five candidates were successful.
Nos complace anunciar que los cinco candidatos tuvieron éxito.
